mapper.select: select A.memail, A.mname, A.birth, A.telnum, A.maddress, B.gno from member A, grade B where A.gno = B.gno and memail = #{email}
update member set mname = #{mname}, birth = #{birth}, telnum = #{telnum}, maddress = #{maddress}, gno = #{gno} where memail = #{memail}

select c1.memail, c1.moddate, c1.regdate, c1.from_social, c1.mname, c1.mpassword, c2.role_set from member c1 join memberrole c2 on c1.memail = c2.memail where c1.memail = #{memail} and c1.from_social=#{from_social}
